arts.ttl: Ronaldo says sorry after Al Nassr game delayed
arts.sum: Cristiano Ronaldo apologised after Al Nassr's game with Al Wehda was delayed due to traffic, before the forward scored and won a penalty in a 2-0 victory in the Saudi Pro League on Tuesday.

arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo edges closer to staggering 1000-goal milestone with a quick-thinking header to spark Al-Nassr's 2-0 Saudi Pro League victory
arts.sum: The 40-year-old had previously netted his record-breaking 900th in September, when he scored for his country against Croatia in their Nations League tie.

arts.ttl: Gareth Bale made 'no regrets' admission after Cristiano Ronaldo showed his true colours
arts.sum: Cristiano Ronaldo and Gareth Bale enjoyed incredible success together at Real Madrid, yet their relationship on and off the pitch was always the source of much speculation

arts.ttl: Karim Benzema reveals task he set himself after Cristiano Ronaldo left Real Madrid - as he opens up on feelings around his own shock exit
arts.sum: Ronaldo had been the main man at the Santiago Bernabeu for the best part of a decade but more pressure fell on Benzema's shoulders when the Portuguese left.

arts.ttl: 'There's no need' â€“ Cristiano Ronaldo claim disputed by Lionel Messi's boss Javier Mascherano
arts.sum: Ex-Barcelona and Argentina star Javier Mascherano has challenged Cristiano Ronaldo's latest comments that he is the greatest player in the history of the game

arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo celebration explained as Lionel Messi involved in two angry rows
arts.sum: Inter Miami and New York City played out an entertaining 2-2 draw in Sunday's MLS season opener - and one player couldn't resist rubbing salt in Lionel Messi's wounds

arts.ttl: Preview: Al Wahda vs. Al-Nassr - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Tuesday's Saudi Pro League clash between Al Wahda and Al-Nassr, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
